definitions.text: a tool consisting of several hooks for grasping and holding; often thrown with a rope
a dredging bucket with hinges like the shell of a clam
the act of engaging in close hand-to-hand combat
examples: we watched his grappling and wrestling with the bully
We got by on just a gallon of gas
They made do on half a loaf of bread every day

definitions.text: to grip or seize, as in a wrestling match
examples: the two men grappled with each other for several minutes
